name: Light of Boran
description:
Expedition to a planet similar to Earth has been sent to discover any alternatives for humans to live. Light of Boran is the name of this expedition that is supposed to bring light and good news to mankind. However, the expedition has been attacked by an unknown forces and YOU must protect it. Here in this ~2 minutes game you'll experience that adventure. Good luck.

Note: This is my very firs mini game, let me know what you think :)

By The Little Lissom Atom Light
